patthana15.28:4.1: Anidassanaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naanidassano nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā ….
patthana15.28:5.1: Anidassanaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paccayā nasanidassano naabyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana15.28:6.1: Appaṭighaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naappaṭigho nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā ….
patthana15.28:7.1: Appaṭighaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naappaṭigho naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā ….
